attributes.action: Call for the resignation of the child protection officers at haringey council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do you not think its about time you started a petition to get the child protection team from haringey sacked. A group has been started on facebook. How many more young innocent kids will be killed at the hands of these incompetent social workers. It is time someone with influence acted!
Regards
Helen Williamson

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
